h4.GetTeamEnts (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_GetTeamEnts_AILib]
Returns a new ent array with all entities from this entity's team, which is basically every
entity in their encounter and all entities spawned by them (excludes dead and/or untargetable
ents etc)


h4.GetTeamEntsAll (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_GetTeamEntsAll_AILib]
Returns a new ent array with all entities from this entity's team, which is basically every
entity in their encounter and all entities spawned by them (includes untargetable etc, but
excludes dead ents)


h4.GetTeamEntsDeadAll (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_GetTeamEntsDeadAll_AILib]
Returns a new ent array with all entities from this entity's team, which is basically every
entity in their encounter and all entities spawned by them (includes all entities including 
untargetable and dead ones)


h4.SetPowerMode (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_SetPowerMode_AILib]
*No Return*
*Parameter 1: mode (string)*
*Parameter 2: on (int)*
Turns the power mode for this entity on or off (lasts until cleared)
